definition: Holland/the Netherlands/abbr. for 荷蘭|荷兰[He2 lan2]
to carry on one's shoulder or back/burden/responsibility
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: The culprit is a hormone called Neuropeptide Y, or NPY.
sentences.chinese: 罪魁禍首是一種叫Y型神經肽或者NPY的荷爾蒙。

sentences.english: Wheat bran and cabbage help maintain estrogen at healthy levels.
sentences.chinese: 麥麩和圓白菜可幫助維護女性荷爾蒙在健康級別。

sentences.english: The results may be linked to levels of testosterone -the male sex hormone.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的結果可能與男性荷爾蒙睪丸素的量有關。

sentences.english: Ethylene is a gaseous phytohormone with a very simple chemical structure.
sentences.chinese: 乙烯是一種化學結構簡單的氣體荷爾蒙。

sentences.english: Just when hormones are needed, the adrenals start to make them.
sentences.chinese: 當需要荷爾蒙時，腎上腺就開始分泌。

sentences.english: Caraway will also assist in the integration of the regeneration hormonal blueprints in ascension.
sentences.chinese: 香菜也將協助提升中再生荷爾蒙藍圖的整合。

sentences.english: It indicated that spermatogonia have the potential capacity for steroid hormones production.
sentences.chinese: 這個結果暗示著精原細胞可能具有荷爾蒙生成之潛能。

sentences.english: A second hormone has an opposite effect and damps exuberance.
sentences.chinese: 另外一種荷爾蒙會產生相反的作用，會遏制繁榮。

sentences.english: Sex hormones can influence cell-mediated immunity and predispose to such infection.
sentences.chinese: 性荷爾蒙已被證實會影響細胞性免疫反應。

sentences.english: Protein helps produce mood and energy-boosting hormones, too.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白質也有助於產生能提升情緒和能量的荷爾蒙。

sentences.english: What's your opinion about hormones and menopause?
sentences.chinese: 你對於荷爾蒙和絕經怎麼看？

sentences.english: We should be looking at hormone production during late pregnancy and lactation.
sentences.chinese: 應該對懷孕後期和哺乳期荷爾蒙產生的過程作研究。

sentences.english: But if a person is a feaster, scientists believe they produce less of the gut hormone.
sentences.chinese: 但科學家認爲，貪喫型暴食者分泌的這種荷爾蒙更少。

sentences.english: Regulation of the endocrine, balance hormones, improve sub-health, anti-aging.
sentences.chinese: 調節內分泌，平衡荷爾蒙，改善亞健康，延緩衰老。

sentences.english: Hormones are chemicals produced by your body's glands.
sentences.chinese: 荷爾蒙是你身體腺體分泌出的一種化學物質。

sentences.english: Aromatize is the enzyme in the body that converts testosterone to estrogen.
sentences.chinese: 芳香化是酵素在轉換睾甾酮成女性荷爾蒙。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
to have an urge/to be impetuous/impulse/urge
